snippet.title: Lifesigns (Visual Novel) — Official Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
The past was haunting — and so, you fled. To the deep web of streets, blinding lights, skyscrapers, creature comforts, a whole new life, a whole new you. Welcome to the City. Welcome to the Corporation. Welcome to the Game.

Lifesigns is a visual novel with choices, telling a story about people who moved to another city in search and hope for a better life. Would it really help change anything? Will they cut themselves free from the past they drag behind or embrace it?

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1383620/Lifesigns/
